#summary Tech project.

Resriction: 1-level tags

= 1. UI =

  * Tags: tree, graph, ...
  * Filter: dropdowns, tree with checkboxes/radios
  * Files; ...

= 2. Modes =

== 2.1. CRUD tags ==

=== Create ===

  * Tag: facet (uniq name through sibling facets)
  * Facet: tag (the same)

=== Update ===

  * Tag, Facet: rename (uniq)
  * Tag, facet: move
  * Tag, Facet: merge

=== Delete ===

== 2.2. CRUD files ==

  * Add file (enable root)
  * Add tag (enable children facets)
  * Add tag recursively
  * Change tag
  * Del tag (del all childen)

== 2.3. Filter ==

  * Add tag
  * Add tag recursively
  * Change tag
  * Del tag

= 3. API =

== 3.1. Data struct ==

  * Graph:
    * get_node(id):Node
  * Node:
    * get_parent():Node
    * get_children():Node
    * add_child(Node)
    * del_child(Node)
    * get_name()
    * set_name(str)
  * Facet(Node)
  * Tag(Node)
